description:
Asyncio is a different way to think about how you program. In this talk we will talk about using asyncio to consume data from a bitcoin exchange offering a websocket endpoint.

Slides: /redirect?event=video_description&v=AcZJUQ3y2ek&redir_token=VHah2dTSHB3JN6V5vnx1DcKnsJZ8MTUzMjc1ODc4NUAxNTMyNjcyMzg1&q=https%3A%2F%2Fspeakerdeck.com%2Fpydataamsterdam%2Fgiovanni-lanzani-tickling-not-too-thick-ticks
title: Asyncio, websockets, and BTC sitting in a tree
